pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.subtitle: HŪBIA is the management system for local businesses that want to organise bookings, clients and staff professionally. A modern experience for clients and team, accessible from web and app, designed to grow with your business. Two clear plans: Studio and Signature.

pwaBlock.title: PWA only, no store apps
pwaBlock.body: The app installs on smartphone (iOS and Android) with your logo and colours. No store required: clients and staff add it from the web page. One piece of software, updates included.

pricing.footer: One-time setup + monthly fee. Setup can be spread over 6 or 12 months at no extra cost.
pricing.setupSectionBody: The setup is one-time and includes: initial system configuration, visual customisation (logo and colours for your business), setup of services and staff, testing and go-live. You can spread it over 6 or 12 months at no extra cost. No hidden fees.
pricing.setupIncludes: Initial configuration, visual customisation, services and staff setup, testing and go-live. One-time, spread over 6 or 12 months.
pricing.setupMaxNote: Guided configuration and direct support until go-live.

faq.q1: Can I move from Studio to Signature?
faq.a1: Yes, upgrade is possible at any time. The change applies from the next billing cycle.
faq.q2: What happens if I choose Studio?
faq.a2: You get all the essentials to manage bookings, calendar, staff, clients and notifications. Advanced features (analytics, automatic recurrences, advanced branding) are available on the Signature plan.
faq.q3: Are advanced features removed or locked?
faq.a3: They are only available on the Signature plan. With Studio they are not active; when you move to Signature you enable them without changing system.
faq.q4: Do I need to install an app from the store?
faq.a4: No. HŪBIA works as a modern web app (PWA): clients and staff can add it to their phone home screen from the browser, without using the stores. Same experience as an app, no store install.
faq.a5: Initial configuration, visual customisation (logo and colours), services and staff setup, testing and go-live. It is one-time and can be spread over 6 or 12 months.
faq.a6: One-time setup at activation (spread over 6 or 12 months) and monthly fee. No long-term commitment.
